summary.span: 代表可以包含其他可見元素的可捲動區域。

span.span: Represents a scrollable area that can contain other visible elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A可讓要比實際大小較小的區域中顯示的內容。A enables content to be displayed in a smaller area than its actual size. 當內容不是完全可見，顯示捲軸，使用者可用來移動內容區域是可見的。When the content of the is not entirely visible, the displays scrollbars that the user can use to move the content areas that is visible. 包含所有的內容區域是範圍。The area that includes all of the content of the is the extent. 內容的可見區域是在檢視區。The visible area of the content is the viewport. 實體捲動可用來依預先決定的實體遞增值 (通常是以像素為單位宣告的值) 捲動內容。Physical scrolling is used to scroll content by a predetermined physical increment, typically by a value that is declared in pixels. 邏輯捲動可用來捲動至邏輯樹狀結構中的下一個項目。Logical scrolling is used to scroll to the next item in the logical tree. 如果您需要實體捲動，而不邏輯捲動的比較，包裝主機中的項目並設定其屬性設`false`。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the host element in a and set its property to `false`. 實體捲動是大多數的預設捲動行為項目。Physical scrolling is the default scroll behavior for most elements. 如果您包含大量的捲動效能可能會影響的項目。If your contains a large number of items, the scrolling performance may be affected. 在此案例中，設定至`true`。In this case, set to `true`. 這會導致內容檢視，以便在拖曳指標時維持不變，並更新時，才發行。This causes the content view to remain static while dragging the and to update only when the is released. 因為捲軸的元素定義於預設樣式的項目，如果您套用至自訂樣式，將不再出現捲軸。Because the scroll bars for a element are defined in the default style of the element, scroll bars will no longer appear if you apply a custom style to a . 捲軸必須定義自訂的樣式，才會出現。Scroll bars must be defined in the custom style for them to appear. ## 自訂 ScrollViewer 控制項Customizing the ScrollViewer Control 若要將相同的屬性設定套用至多個控制項，可使用屬性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改預設，讓控制項的獨特的外觀。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 如需有關建立，請參閱 < [ 透過建立 ControlTemplate 自訂現有控制項的外觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的組件和狀態所特有，請參閱 < [ScrollViewer 樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/scrollviewer-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [ScrollViewer Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/scrollviewer-styles-and-templates.md). 此控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值，當控制項出現在應用程式。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式會決定由哪一個桌面佈景主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 預設 WPF 佈景主題](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > 設定視覺化屬性只能影響該屬性是否都存在於控制項的預設範本，並設定使用。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in control's default template and is set by using a . 您可以找到的視覺化屬性清單中的 「 變更視覺結構的控制項 」 一節[透過建立 ControlTemplate 自訂現有控制項的外觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立包含一些文字和矩形。The following example creates a that contains some text and a rectangle. 只有在需要時，會出現捲軸。The scroll bars appear only when they are needed. 當您調整視窗時，捲軸出現和消失。When you resize the window, the scroll bars appear and disappear. remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的內容可捲動實體單位或邏輯單元。Content in a can be scrolled in terms of physical units or logical units. 實體的單位是裝置獨立像素。Physical units are device independent pixels. 邏輯單元用於捲動中的項目。Logical units are used for scrolling items within an . 預設行為是使用實體單位捲動內容。The default behavior of the is to use physical units to scroll its content. 不過，萬一其中設為`true`，內容可以使用邏輯單元來捲動。However, in cases where the is set to `true`, the content could use logical units to scroll. 例如， ， ，和其他控制項，繼承自使用可捲動的邏輯單元。For example, , , and other controls that inherit from use logical units to scroll. 如果已`true`，值， ， ，和屬性是數字的項目，而不是實體單位。If is `true`, the values of the , , , and properties are number of items, instead of physical units. 如果您需要實體捲動，而不邏輯捲動的比較，包裝主機中的項目並設定其屬性設`false`。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the host element in a and set its property to `false`. 實體捲動是大多數的預設捲動行為項目。Physical scrolling is the default scroll behavior for most elements. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定使用程式碼的屬性。The following example demonstrates how to set the property by using code. summary.span: 回應特定鍵盤輸入，並叫用相關的捲動行為。

span.span: Responds to specific keyboard input and invokes associated scrolling behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可辨識下列的鍵盤輸入：The following keyboard input is recognized: - 向左箭號： 內容捲動至左的一行。The LEFT ARROW key: Scrolls content one line to the left. - 向右鍵： 將內容捲動到右邊的同一行。The RIGHT ARROW key: Scrolls content one line to the right. - 向上鍵： 將內容向上捲動一行。The UP ARROW key: Scrolls content upward by one line. - 向下鍵： 將內容向下捲動一行。The DOWN ARROW key: Scrolls content downward by one line. - PAGE UP： 捲動至目前的頁面頂端的內容。PAGE UP: Scrolls content to the top of the current page. - PAGE down 鍵： 捲動至目前的頁面底部的內容。PAGE DOWN: Scrolls content to the bottom of the current page. - 首頁： 捲動至第一頁頂端的內容。HOME: Scrolls content to the top of the first page. - 結束： 捲動內容的最後一頁的底部。END: Scrolls content to the bottom of the last page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定是否捲動水平、 垂直或兩者。The property specifies whether the scroll horizontally, vertically, or both. 當使用者將手指拖曳支援 Windows Touch 的觸控式裝置上的控制項上時，就會捲動。The will scroll when a user drags a finger on the control on a touch device that supports Windows Touch. 可以是任一組直接對或做為附加屬性。 can be either set directly on a or used as an attached property. 當控制項包含在其，使用為附加屬性以指定行為在。When a control contains a in its , use as an attached property to specify the behavior of the in the . 當您使用之外，將直接對。When you use a outside of a , set directly on the . ## Examples 下列範例會建立，將數個項目加入其中。The following example creates a and adds several elements to it. 在此範例中，當視窗大小變更時，大小`textblock1`也會變更。In this example, when the size of the window changes, the size of `textblock1` also changes. 當太小而無法顯示所有內容，變成可捲動。When the is too small to display all of the content, the becomes scrollable. 範例會設定要，讓使用者能夠捲動水平和垂直使用手指。The example sets to so that the user can scroll the horizontally and vertically by using a finger. [!code-xaml[ScrollViewerPanning#PanningModeDirect](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/scrollviewerpanning/CS/mainwindow.xaml#panningmodedirect)] 下列範例會建立，並使用為附加屬性。The following example creates a and uses as an attached property. 依預設中的具有其到。By default the in the of a has its to . 這是讓當使用者水平移動手指垂直移之前，使用者會反白顯示文字。This is so that when the user moves a finger horizontally before moving it vertically, the user highlights text. 範例會設定至，讓使用者無法使用手指來選取文字。The example sets to so that the user cannot select text by using a finger. 請注意，設定至也會防止使用者選取的文字。Note that setting to also prevents the user from selecting text. 範例會設定屬性設，因此不需要水平捲動。The example sets the property to , so horizontal scrolling is not necessary. [!code-xaml[ScrollViewerPanning#PanningModeAttached](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/scrollviewerpanning/CS/mainwindow.xaml#panningmodeattached)]

summary.span: 垂直捲動至 內容的結尾。

span.span: Scrolls vertically to the end of the content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個方法不引發任何捲動行為是`null`。This method does not induce any scrolling behavior if is `null`. 邏輯捲動可用來捲動至下一個項目，邏輯樹狀結構中。Logical scrolling is used to scroll to the next element in the logical tree. 這不同於實體捲動時，它將內容依定義的實體遞增值，以指定的方向捲動。This differs from physical scrolling, which scrolls content by a defined physical increment in a given direction. 如果您需要實體捲動，而不邏輯捲動的比較，包裝主機中的項目並設定其屬性設`false`。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the host element in a and set its property to `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 正值會對應到上方的位移的內容。A positive value corresponds to the content being offset to the top. 有效值介於 0 與 減去 之間。Valid values are between zero and the minus the . 如果已`true`，值， ， ，和屬性是數字的項目。If is `true`, the values of the , , , and properties are number of items. 如果是`false`，這些屬性的值會與裝置無關的像素。If is `false`, the values of these properties are Device Independent Pixels. 從.NET Framework 3.5 SP1 版開始時是`true`，持續地變更為使用者拖曳，但是內容的檢視不會變更之前發行。Beginning in the .NET Framework version 3.5 SP1, when is `true`, continues to change as the user drags the , but the content view doesn't change until the is released. 在此情況下，表示可見內容的位移和表示內容為基礎的位移位置。In this case, represents the visible content offset and represents the content offset based on the position. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|
